timeline.bodyText: Are you sure it's needed? It is also done just below.
timeline.author: ftence

timeline.bodyText: Correct me if I'm wrong but i think you could do that even if !zeroChunkCount. All you have to do is to update chunkcount with chunkcount -= (lastchunk - lasttick) / chunkwidth.
timeline.author: ftence

timeline.bodyText:
You must add if (lastchunkid > newestChunk).
Also, the same idea as above comment can apply here: drop zeroChunkCount and update chunkcount with chunkcount -= (lastchunkid - newestChunk) / chunkwidth
timeline.author: ftence

timeline.message: Addressed PR comments, fixing handling of chunkcount

timeline.bodyText: Please update the comment to reflect the code below.
timeline.author: ftence
ftence
